big_texts.all_cars_are_checked: We check history and technical conditions on all used cars to offer only the best
big_texts.one_year_warranty: All cars in Carfest have 1 year warranty on engine, gearbox and drive shaft
big_texts.fully_functional_cars: We restore every little damage on every used car until they are fully functional and like new
big_texts.beast_leasing_offers: We cooperate with several leasing companies. This gives us and opportunity to offer best leasing terms on market
